item.title: Analyzing Inpatient Data From the Hospital Charge Data Set
item.description: Letâ€™s examine the Hospital Charge Dataset from data.gov I wanted to analyse this dataset because I wanted to know the different charges among different providers The dataset has the following columns: DRG Definition (diagnosis) Provider Id Provider Name Provider Street Address Provider City Provider State Provider Zip Code Hospital Referral Region Description Total Discharges Average Covered Charges Average Total Payments

item.title: Word Vectors
item.description: Word Vectors Word Vectors have been shown to capture semantic and syntactic relationships very well
